City Administrator
==================

City Administrator-
**City Administrator Duties**
The City of Sansom Park operates under the Council- Administrator form of government.
Under this system, the City Council appoints the City Administrator, who acts as the chief executive officer of the city.  The City Administrator is responsible for the day-to-day operation of all city departments and enforces policy and administers city programs.
The City Attorney and Municipal Court Judges are appointed by and responsible to the City Council; department directors are hired by and responsible to the City Administrator.
